data.oai_dc:dc: Freshwater shrimps, Freshwater crabs, Aquatic insects, Itoshima city, Freshwater fishes, Amphibians, Snakes, fairy shrimp, Kamogawa River, Fukuoka, horseshoe crab, Freshwater snails, Occurrence|Observation

Kamogawa River is located on the northern part of Kyushu Island, which is one of four mainlands of Japan. A survey on aquatic animals of Kamogawa River Basin was carried out, as well as taking the photographs.|611 occurrences
